definition: The action of propelling an object through the air with force, typically performed by using one's arm or hand. It is commonly used in sports, games, or recreational activities.

examples.german: Wirf den Müll in den Mülleimer!
examples.english: Throw the trash in the trash can!

examples.german: Wirf einen Blick auf das Buch!
examples.english: Take a look at the book!
